Re-copied 7/12/28                           K-319-1905 
   by L.F.W. 


                                  Takoma Park, Washington, D.C. 
                                        June 2, 1905 

Dr. J. H. Kellogg 

Dear Brother: 


     A scene has been presented before me of actions performed by you, similar to the actions of Satan in the heavenly courts. From time to time I have given warnings to different ones who were being blinded by your sophistries and misrepresentations. Your power of misrepresentation is so continuously exerted that many have been deceived.
